title: This new rank que system is soo  bad
body: I would 100% love the option for the old one back even just for myself. i forgot to lock in twice from 5 mins que timer to 30 mins how is this work ??? And im not even  get my hopes up what rank i going  get put in, because i been put in games with the retards

replies.body:
It was in every video that you need to lock in. 

There is a post on the home page of this website that you need to lock in.

THERE IS A NOTIFICATION THAT POPS UP IN YOUR FACE WHEN THE CHAMP SELECT OPENS THAT YOU NEED TO LOCK IN.

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=MwROE99t,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-20T19:25:34.589+0000)
>
> It was in every video that you need to lock in. 
> 
> There is a post on the home page of this website that you need to lock in.
> 
> THERE IS A NOTIFICATION THAT POPS UP IN YOUR FACE WHEN THE CHAMP SELECT OPENS THAT YOU NEED TO LOCK IN.

Calm down lad ;-)
lel i just h8 people who complain about every new change in league
It's bugged too I just got kicked from a game because my ban wouldn't lock in so got a 6min wait then about a minute later get a message saying could not lock in champ or some shit
